players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead during the night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our grasp."
Diana: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. Given that one of us was found dead during the night, it's crucial that we work together to ensure everyone's safety."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. We need to be vigilant and work together to identify the mafia among us. Let's all share any suspicious activities or observations we may have had during the night."
